overview:
CEO of Artolo. Smiles in the face of adversity. Thinks optimism is underrated. Thinks realism is overrated. On a mission to change world for the better!

From 2010 to 2012 he was Chief Executive of dBs Music, a leading provider of music technology training in the UK. Before that, for 4 years, he was managing director of Jo Downs Glass (one of the UK’s most successful art/craft businesses, with gallery shops throughout the South West of England).

His varied career has seen him work as a graphics designer in television (MTV), a computer programmer for the MOD, produce a documentary featuring RSC founder Sir Peter Hall, teach homeless people film-making, manage an arts centre, run a fringe theatre and write radio ads for Time Out.
